title: Grateful Dead Live at Hartford Civic Center on 1982-04-18
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi DR-2 > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > R8Brain > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 1644 Tagged. Transfer by Andrew F. 01/2012
source: AUD: 2x Nakamichi CM300's > Sony TC-D5M > TDK MA-90's. Set up behind the stage, recorded from the rear-facing P.A. system. Taped by Joe Morrone.
